title: Scholarship Amount
content:
For a PESSAT student, what would the MRD and CNR amounts be? 
Is it 50% of the semester tuition fee or entire year?

comments.body:
I'm not sure the fee for your batch. 

But for mine the fee is 4.1 of which 3.6 is the tuition fee

Scholarship is on the tuition fee for the semester. So 40 and 50 percent  of 1.8

Mrd is 72k and cnr is 90k.

Yes, I’m in 2nd year too, fee is the same
I think it’s the other way round this time, so cnr is 72k and mrd 90k afaik!
Oh yeah i remember. I guess they decided mrd is more important. Doesn't matter though money doesn't change
Is it wrong to confirm lol
Wait, so mrd is supposed to be 90k?? When did this change take place?
Not anymore. They changed it to total fee afaik. Atleast that is what they send in the seminar at the start of the sem. So cnr is 80k and mrd is 1.025L

I hope it's true

Can you send the pdf you found it in. I want the happiness
